allow: Bash(timeout 20 powershell -Command "while ($true) { $file = Get-ChildItem tests\integration\match_tests\single_match_*.json | Sort-Object LastWriteTime -Descending | Select-Object -First 1; if ($file.LastWriteTime -gt (Get-Date).AddMinutes(-2)) { Write-Host ''New file found:'' $file.Name; Get-Content $file.FullName | python -m json.tool | Select-Object -First 100; break } else { Write-Host ''Waiting for new results...''; Start-Sleep -Seconds 5 } }")

Bash(del AMELIORATIONS_LUCIDE_CONTEXTE_DYNAMIQUE.md CODE_REVIEW_RAPPORT.md DEMONSTRATION_CONTEXTE_ENDPOINTS.md DOCKER_SETUP.md GUIDE_INTEGRATION_FILTERSBAR.md HANDOFF_GUIDE.md IMPLEMENTATION_DROPDOWNS_EXTERNES.md MODIFICATIONS_STATISTIQUES.md PHASE_1_SUMMARY.md PLAN_IMPLEMENTATION_TESTS.md PROBLEMES_UI_ET_SOLUTIONS.md RAPPORT_COMPLET_CONTEXTES_INTENTIONS.md RECAPITULATIF_MODIFICATIONS.md Structure_Analyse_Match_Lucide.md VALIDATION_CONTEXTE_DYNAMIQUE.md)
